title: [Question] Should i revise/ study EPD for DDCO?
content: I haven't done that well in epd in semester 2, I feel very about it and want to do better in semester 3. So, should I study it for the 5 credit subject DDCO in order to score well in it?

comments.body: Just study how different gates works that will be more than enough I guess. Apart from gates there is not much relation between epd and ddco

No, purchase the DDCO textbook, and start reading it if you want, epd wont really help that much, the textbook explains everything from scratch. If you dont wanna buy it im pretty sure every editions pdf is available somewhere.

Find the curriculum and the respective chapters and try understanding whats going on because the slides for ddco are nothing more than a joke.

You cannot survive DDCO without a textbook, we all learnt that the hard way after our first ISA.

Also, ddco might be a bit overwhelming to start on your own right now, so maybe look into web tech, that subject is easier to do on your own and its also 5 credits and it really screwed all of us over.

But its easier to self study more than ddco atleast.
What TB do they follow? Any good names?

Digital design -morris mano
Computer organisation -Carl hamacher
Don't buy the textbook lmao, that's just a waste of money, just use the soft copy, but yest, it's either use the textbook or get no marks for ddco
that's 2 books for both the semesters respectively?

No these 2 textbooks are for DDCO in 3rd sem
